remarks.format:
## Remarks 对象将传递到事件的任何事件处理程序。 The object is passed to any event handler for the event. 在数据源中执行更新操作之前, 可以使用对象来检查数据。You can use the object to examine the data before the update operation is executed in the data source. 然后, 您可以对数据进行验证, 检查数据类引发的验证异常, 或在更新之前更改值。You can then validate the data, examine validation exceptions thrown by the data class, or change a value before the update. 您还可以取消更新操作。You can also cancel the update operation. 对象包含最初从数据源检索的数据。The object contains the data that was originally retrieved from the data source. 对象包含在更新操作期间将保存在数据源中的数据。The object contains the data that will be saved in the data source during the update operation. 如果表示数据源的对象在更新数据之前引发验证异常, 则该属性将包含类的实例。If the object that represents the data source throws a validation exception before updating the data, the property contains an instance of the class. 您可以通过属性检索所有验证异常。You can retrieve all the validation exceptions through the property. 如果未引发验证异常, 则属性将包含`null`。If no validation exception is thrown, the property contains `null`. 如果处理验证异常并且不希望重新引发异常, 请将属性设置为。 `true`If you handle the validation exceptions and do not want the exception to be re-thrown, set the property to `true`. 默认情况下, 该控件将数据源中的原始值存储在网页上的视图状态中, 只不过其特性被标记为`UpdateCheck.Never`。By default, the control stores the original values from the data source in view state on the Web page, except those whose attribute is marked as `UpdateCheck.Never`. LINQ to SQL 会在更新数据之前自动检查数据的完整性。LINQ to SQL automatically checks the integrity of the data before updating the data. 它通过将数据源中的当前值与存储在视图状态中的原始值进行比较来实现此功能。It does this by comparing the current values in the data source with the original values stored in view state. 如果数据源中的值已更改, LINQ to SQL 会引发异常。LINQ to SQL raises an exception if the values in the data source have changed. 您可以通过为事件创建处理程序来执行其他数据验证。You can perform additional data validation by creating a handler for the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例演示如何对属性 和属性的属性进行比较, 以确定`Category`属性中的值是否已更改。The example shows how to compare properties from the property and the property to determine whether the value in the `Category` property has changed. 如果是这样, `CategoryChanged`则属性中对象的属性设置为`true`。If so, the `CategoryChanged` property of the object in the property is set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 它通过使用控件显示任何验证异常消息。It displays any validation exception messages by using a control. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Updating(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message & "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Updating(object sender, LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用属性来根据数据源中的当前值检查原始值并取消更新操作或执行其他操作。You can use the property to check the original values against the current values in the data source and to cancel the update operation or take other action. 属性仅包含在网页中的视图状态中保留的属性的值。The property contains values for only the properties that are persisted in view state in the Web page. 在这些情况下, 属性将持久保存:A property is persisted under these circumstances: - 在数据绑定控件中显示时。When it is displayed in a data-bound control. - 当特性的`Always`属性设置为或`WhenChanged`时。 When the property of the attribute is set to `Always` or `WhenChanged`. `Never`如果将属性设置为, 并且未在数据绑定控件中显示该值, 则不会将该值存储在网页中。If the property is set to `Never` and the value is not displayed in a data-bound control, the value is not stored in the Web page. 在这种情况下, 不能将其分配给属性。In that case, it cannot be assigned to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例演示如何对属性 和属性的属性进行比较, 以确定`Category`属性中的值是否已更改。The example shows how to compare properties from the property and the property to determine whether the value in the `Category` property has changed. 如果是这样, `CategoryChanged`则属性中对象的属性设置为`true`。If so, the `CategoryChanged` property of the object in the property is set to `true`.
